text: The Prisoner of Second Avenue is a 1975 American black comedy movie directed by Melvin Frank and based on the 1971 play of the same name by Neil Simon. It stars Jack Lemmon, Anne Bancroft, Gene Sacks, F. Murray Abraham and Sylvester Stallone and was distributed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 comedy-drama movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Melvin Frank Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies composed by Marvin Hamlisch
title: The Prisoner of Second Avenue
